name: Hellgor
description:
This game was made for the Secret Santa Jam 2021, but can't be deliver at time (19 dec), because was made late, and I was bussy.

This game is about a very known algorithms, represented as 7 sins, because I love Full Metal Alchemist and mi giftee love complex games and algorithms. In it you should wander in the hell seen the beings behaviour, in this way you can solve the puzzle describing the beings, at end the game give a gift.

giftee: Gramozilho

---------------------------------

Este juego es sobre unos algoritmos muy conocidos, representados como los 7 pecados capitales, ya que me gusta Full Metal Alchemist y mi "regalado" gusta de juegos complejos y algoritmos. Se trata de vagar por el inframundo viendo como interactúan los entes, y de este modo resolver el puzzle que trata de describirlos, al hacerlo hay un regalo.
